## Schedule

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| message: false
library(tidyverse)
library(reactable)
library(reactablefmtr)
# Load schedule 
sched <- read_csv("schedule.csv")

reactable(select(sched, `Module Week`, `Instructor Training July Session Date`, `Class Session Date`), theme = flatly(), sortable = FALSE)
```
